pages.text: $(li)Endermen and Shulkers can no longer teleport inside dungeons.$(li)Players can no longer use Chorus Fruit to teleport inside dungeons.$(li)Added a secret new item which can help reveal other secrets! It can be found in chests.

$(li)New /givekey cheat that accepts multiple parameters.$(li)Revised loot table functionality and contents.$(li)Many new rooms added and revised.$(li)Basic and advanced tier dungeons now have more unique differences.
